import React, { useState } from 'react'; import '../styles/Contato.css'; const Contato = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ nome: '', email: '', telefone: '', assunto: '', mensagem: '' }); const [isSubmitting, setIsSubmitting] = useState(false); const [submitStatus, setSubmitStatus] = useState(null); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setIsSubmitting(true); setTimeout(() => { setIsSubmitting(false); setSubmitStatus('success'); setFormData({ nome: '', email: '', telefone: '', assunto: '', mensagem: '' }); setTimeout(() => setSubmitStatus(null), 5000); }, 2000); }; return (
